code: import"./style.css";import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import data from"../../../products.json";import Card from"./components/Card/Card";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ReviewedItems(){const[reviewedItems,setReviewedItems]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const listOfItems=[...data.products];const randomItems=[];while(randomItems.length<3){const randomIndex=Math.floor(Math.random()*listOfItems.length);const randomElement=listOfItems[randomIndex];if(!randomItems.includes(randomElement)){randomItems.push(randomElement);}}setReviewedItems(randomItems);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar_reviewed_by_you",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"sidebar_section_title",children:"Reviewed by you"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar_reviewed_by_you_items",children:reviewedItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{item:item},item.id))})]});}export default ReviewedItems;
